tech.title: Technologies
tech.paragraph_zero: As a front-end developer, I provide comprehensive solutions for web applications. I have skills in developing responsive websites, following best practices.

projects.paragraph_zero: I am committed to enhancing my skills and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies.
